aeneas.models

Class Bullpen.BullpenLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • aeneas.models.Bullpen.BullpenLogic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    Bullpen

    public static class Bullpen.BullpenLogic
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Represents the logic of a bullpen. This determines what kind of actions/behavior are valid for a particular Bullpen
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
